name: Mémorise
description: Mémorise is a memory game advertised for children aged three to eight. The goal is to memorise a board of six objects along a determined amount of time (more or less according to the difficulty level selected) and then place these objects in the correct position on a empty board. The player can select the length of the game (from 3 to 24 boards to play) and the difficulty level (between six levels).
alsoFor: Amiga, Amstrad CPC, DOS | Combined View

releases.country: France, Germany, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom
